title: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Clarno Unit:  Trails Picnic Area    Painted Hills Unit:  Trails Picnic Area    Sheep Rock Unit:  Thomas Condon Paleontology Center Historic Cant Ranch Trails Picnic Areas   Â     Fossils from all three units of the monument are on display at the Thomas Condon Paleontology Center.
